TextView.android:text: Fast facts on calorie intake and use
Recommended calorie intake depends on factors such as age,size,height,sex,lifestyle, and overall general health.
Eating a big breakfast could help with weight reduction and maintenance.
The brain uses around 20 percent of energy used in the human body
A 500-calorie meal consisting of fruits and vegetables has more health benefits and will keepyou feeling full fo longer than a 500 calorie snack of pop

Keeping calorie intake within certain limit will not ensure a health diet, as different foods have different effects on the body. After consuming carbohydrate(carbs), insulin levels will rise significantly more compared with eating fats or protein. Some carbs in particular get into the blood stream in the form of sugar,or glucose, much faster than other. Refined flour is a fast card, while legumes are solower. slow- release carbs are better for body weight control and overall health than fast carbs.A 500 calorie meal of fish or meat,salad and some olive oil,followed by fruits is, more healthful and will stave off hunger for longer than a 500 calorie snack of popcorn with butter or toffee
